entry.question: What happens if I play this with a Melee character on my team, but no Seekers?
entry.answer: You scrap an enemy Weapon, but move no damage.

entry.question: What happens if I play this with a Seeker character on my team, but no Melee characters?
entry.answer: You move 1 damage from each of your Seekers to an enemy (scales for each character), but you would not scrap an enemy Weapon.

entry.question: Do I get both effects if I have characters with both traits on my team?
entry.answer: Yes; this card doesnâ€™t ask you to choose.
